title: Domino's aims to double store count to 4,000 in India in 5-6 years
description: Domino's, the renowned American pizza chain, is poised to double its store count in India to 4,000 within the next 5-6 years. With the recent inauguration of its 2,000th store in India, Domino's has solidified its position as a major player in the Indian market, ranking second globally in operational stores and among the top five in revenue.
